title: Bound by Lies
description: Torn between two men; one was what I needed, the other was what I wanted.One man was safe and the other was dangerous.But both men would lay down their lives to save me.ATF agent Sam Cortez is fighting to bring down the Estrada family empire, which was built on murder and corruption. Alex Estrada did what was needed to keep me safe…and paid with his life.  Starting over as I try to rebuild my life, it’s clear that the past is never what it seems. What no one knew was that we were all bound by lies.
author: Rebecca Shea
